mil7.3.6:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘navalagganakassa dve angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani dve angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.3.6:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, navalagganakam bahuumijalakulavikkhobhitasalilatale mahatimahasamudde navam laggeti thapeti, na deti disavidisam haritum;
mil7.3.6:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena ragadosamohumijale mahatimahavitakkasampahare cittam laggetabbam, na databbam disavidisam haritum.
mil7.3.6:1.4: Idam, maharaja, navalagganakassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.3.6:2.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, navalagganakam na plavati visidati, hatthasatepi udake navam laggeti thanamupaneti;
mil7.3.6:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena labhayasasakkaramananavandanapujanaapacitisu labhaggayasaggepi na plavitabbam, sarirayapanamattake yeva cittam thapetabbam.
mil7.3.6:2.3: Idam, maharaja, navalagganakassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
